name: Kan
description: A browser extension for reading nLab

scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run chrome-build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run opera-build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run firefox-build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run edge-build
scripts.chrome-dist: cross-env NODE_ENV=production cross-env TARGET=chrome gulp dist
scripts.opera-dist: cross-env NODE_ENV=production cross-env TARGET=opera gulp dist
scripts.firefox-dist: cross-env NODE_ENV=production cross-env TARGET=firefox gulp dist
scripts.edge-dist: cross-env NODE_ENV=production cross-env TARGET=edge gulp dist
scripts.dist: npm run chrome-dist && npm run opera-dist && npm run firefox-dist && npm run edge-dist

author: Jake <jake@keplr.io> (http://jake.run)
